Files

file  Emma-API.h

Implemented functions depending of the CPU / Plateform

This function must be implemented for using full EMMA HARDWARE API.



void initPWM (void)
void setPWM (char pin, int val)
int getPWM (char pin)
void i2c_init (void)
unsigned char i2c_start (unsigned char address)
int i2c_start_wait (unsigned char address)
unsigned char i2c_rep_start (unsigned char address)
void i2c_stop (void)
unsigned char i2c_write (unsigned char data)
unsigned char i2c_readAck (void)
unsigned char i2c_readNak (void)

Implemented functions for each EMMA Applications

This must be never used. RESSOURCES_INIT RESSOURCES_LOADER



void ressources_init ()
void ressources_loader ()

Ressource functions API



#define RESSOURCES_LOADER()   void ressources_loader()
 Loader of ressources in Emma-Rest6 Engine.
This function must be implemented in the file : /contiki-2.x/plateform/{MyApps}/Agent-Rest6.c.
#define RESSOURCES_INIT()   void ressources_init()
 Init function called by Emma Core on starting device.
This function must be implemented in the file : /contiki-2.x/plateform/{MyApps}/Agent-Rest6.c.
#define RESSOURCE_INIT(sensor)   volatile struct Ressource sensor
 Declaration of a ressource in the Emma-Rest6 Engine
A new declaration of ressource will allocate slot for data ressource and data log.
#define RESSOURCE_UNIT(sensor, unite)
 Initialization of the ressource unit.
#define RESSOURCE_SET(sensor, setFunc)   sensor.setData = setFunc
 Initialization of the setter function for a ressource.
#define RESSOURCE_GET(sensor, getFunc)   sensor.getData = getFunc
 Initialization of the getter function for a ressource.
#define RESSOURCE_LOAD(sensor)   extern struct Ressource sensor
 Get an external ressource.
#define RESSOURCE_LIST(name)
 Create a new ressource list.
#define RESSOURCE_LIST_LOAD(name)   extern list_t name
 Load an external ressource list.

Hardware Digit Functions API



#define HARDWARE_DIGIT_GET(port, pin)   ((port & ( 1 << pin)) > 0)
 Return the current value of a specify pin.
#define HARDWARE_DIGIT_SET_UP(port, pin)   port |= (1 << pin)
 Set up a specify pin.
#define HARDWARE_DIGIT_SET_DOWN(port, pin)   port &= ~(1<<pin)
 Set down a specify pin.

Hardware PWM (Pulse Width Modulation) API



#define HARDWARE_PWM_INIT()   initPWM()
 Initialize the four standard PWM (OCR1A, OCR1B, OCR3A, OCR3B).
#define HARDWARE_PWM_SET(pin, val)   setPWM(pin,val)
 Set the value of a specify pwm.
#define HARDWARE_PWM_GET(pin)   getPWM(pin)
 Get the value of a specify pwm.

Hardware Two Wire Interface (I2C) API



#define I2C_READ_FLAG   1
#define I2C_WRITE_FLAG   0
#define I2C_INIT()   i2c_init()
 Interface function for init TWI(I2C) interface, all plateforms must implement this function.
#define I2C_START(addr)   i2c_start(addr)
 Interface function for start TWI(I2C) communication, all plateform must implements this function.
#define I2C_START_WAIT(addr)   i2c_start_wait(addr)
 Waiting Interface function for start TWI(I2C) communication, all plateform must implements this function.
#define I2C_REP_START(addr)   i2c_rep_start(addr)
 Interface function for repeating start TWI(I2C) communication, all plateform must implements this function.
#define I2C_STOP()   i2c_stop()
 Interface function for stopping and releasing TWI(I2C) communication, all plateform must implements this function.
#define I2C_WRITE(data)   i2c_write(data)
 Interface function for sending a byte over TWI(I2C) communication, all plateform must implements this function.
#define I2C_READ_ACK()   i2c_readAck()
 Interface function for reading one byte from TWI(I2C) communication, all plateform must implements this function.
#define I2C_READ_NACK()   i2c_readNak()
 Interface function for reading one byte if followed by a stop condition from TWI(I2C) communication, all plateform must implements this function.

#define HARDWARE_DIGIT_GET ( port,
pin   )     ((port & ( 1 << pin)) > 0)

Return the current value of a specify pin.

Parameters:
port PORT name of the pin
pin PIN number on the specify port
Returns:
The current value of the pin.
Examples:
Rest6-Agent-actuator.c, and Rest6-Agent-sensor.c.

#define I2C_READ_NACK (  )     i2c_readNak()

Interface function for reading one byte if followed by a stop condition from TWI(I2C) communication, all plateform must implements this function.

Returns:
The readed data byte.
Examples:

Definition at line 284 of file Emma-API.h.

#define I2C_REP_START ( addr   )     i2c_rep_start(addr)

Interface function for repeating start TWI(I2C) communication, all plateform must implements this function.

Parameters:
address Address of the target device.
Return values:
0 Success in target device access.
1 Fail in configuration of the communication
2 Fail in target device access. (Bad address)
Examples:
ressources.c.

Parameters:

Definition at line 97 of file Emma-API.h.

#define RESSOURCE_INIT ( sensor   )     volatile struct Ressource sensor

Declaration of a ressource in the Emma-Rest6 Engine
A new declaration of ressource will allocate slot for data ressource and data log.

Parameters:
sensor Name of the new ressource, this name will be used for the publish attribute
Returns:
No return value
Examples:
Rest6-Agent-actuator.c, and Rest6-Agent-sensor.c.

         volatile list_t name = (list_t)&LIST_CONCAT(name,_list)

#define RESSOURCE_UNIT ( sensor,
unite   ) 
Value:
strcpy((char*)sensor.name,#sensor "\0"); \
                        list_add(ressources_list, (char*)&sensor); \
                        strcpy((char*)sensor.unit,#unite "\0")

Initialization of the ressource unit.

Parameters:
sensor Name of the ressource to set the unit.
unite Name of the unit, this name is used for published data attribute.
Returns:
No return value
Examples:
Rest6-Agent-actuator.c, and Rest6-Agent-sensor.c.

Returns:
